This trial aim evaluate efficacy tolerance 3 different second line treatment strategy : two recommend WHO combine two non-nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor associate ritonavir boost protease inhibitor ( emtricitabine-tenofovir-lopinavir/ritonavir abacavir-didanosine-lopinavir/ritonavir ) ; third strategy combine emtricitabine-tenofovir-darunavir/ritonavir yet evaluate Sub-Saharian Africa .
